effects.display_string: (2) Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Dispatch by 6% stacking up to 5 times. Dispatch has a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Roll the Bones has a 40% increased chance of granting additional combat enhancements and also applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! for each combat enhancement granted.

Stacks applied by Roll the Bones can exceed the normal Winning Streak! maximum of 5.

name: Silken Advisor's Favor
description: To my most trusted advisors for their loyalty, wisdom, and above all - unity.

effects.display_string: Set: Your Sinister Strike, Pistol Shot, and Ambush have a 35% chance to Ethereal Rampage, dealing 30% increased damage as Shadow.
Set: Ethereal Rampage additionally increases the damage of your next Between the Eyes by 15%, stacking up to 4 times.

Set: Ethereal Rampage additionally increases the damage of your next Between the Eyes by 15%, stacking up to 4 times.

Set: Ethereal Rampage additionally increases the damage of your next Between the Eyes by 15%, stacking up to 4 times.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Set: Ethereal Rampage additionally increases the damage of your next Between the Eyes by 15%, stacking up to 4 times.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to let loose a nascent empowerment from the crystal, increasing a random secondary stat by 3,133 for 20 sec.
Equip: Your attacks have a chance to mark their targets as Dead Ahead. Attacking the marked target grants 1,020 Critical Strike for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
